summary: This bill, the Law Enforcement Scenario-Based Training for Safety and De-Escalation Act of 2025, mandates the Attorney General to develop a scenario-based training curriculum for law enforcement, focusing on improving community relations, officer safety, de-escalation, and other critical areas. The Attorney General will also administer a grant program to provide access to this training.  The bill requires reports on the curriculum's effectiveness and the grant program's impact, with no new funding authorized. It defines key terms like "community-based organization" and "scenario-based training."
